name: M&M's Beach Party
overview: Your favorite M&M'S® candy characters are serving up summertime fun in M&M'S® Beach Party! Get on your feet and compete in six unique and physically challenging games like the Kayak Race, the Mr. Runch Slam, and Skee-Ball! What day at the beach would be complete without Beach Volleyball? Bump, set, and spike your way to victory during a full-length volleyball game!
